name: Riddle of the Sphinx
storyline:
Your adventure begins at the Giza Sphinx, the 'Father of Terror'. Then, you can trek deep into the enigmatic chambers of the Great Pyramid. But this is only the beginning of an exciting journey.

Should you be successful, your efforts will reveal and solve many of the real-life archaeological mysteries surrounding the Sphinx and Great Pyramid, and ultimately solve the Riddle of the Sphinx. Should you fail, well... your fate will be sealed with those who have gone before you!
summary: Explore secret chambers. Discover hidden tombs. Unearth ancient riddles. And unravel an ancient riddle, entombed for centuries by the ancient Egyptians! Riddle of the Sphinx is an epic ancient Egyptian adventure featuring unlimited exploration in and around the Giza Sphinx and Great Pyramid of Cheops. This is your opportunity to immerse yourself into the Giza Sphinx and Great Pyramid - one of the last seven wonders of the ancient world.Download Riddle of the Sphinx to explore and discover the mysteries of Ancient Egypt!
